Posts.Content: Jan 22, 2010 12:24PM lyazz wrote: When I was in the middle of chemo, I got a terrible gag reflex, which would come on even talking about what was going on.  I was taking a bunch of supplements and having a hard time swallowing.  The social worker in oncology suggested bio feedback, something about re-programming so I could get beyond it.  I ended up taking my pills with fruit milk shakes (and I wonder why I didn't lose weight when I wasn't eating much) and I didn't do the bio feedback, so I don't know if it would have been helpful.  Good luck, that can be so hard...
Posts.Title: phobia needing help hezzy dreamwriter
